Author: silkirishroses
Text: Same. I got this app and it measures everything and every nutrient. I’ve been eating 1/8 of everything because 1/4 is the smallest amount it tracks. I really spend most of my time on the diet app and when I eat something that I don’t track I hate the feeling,l. It’s little ruining me and I hope we both get to a place where we can eat pretzels and not count each one.

Author: littlebluezombie
Text: I know it may seem impossible to you now, but it IS possible to eat without counting calories. Deleting my calorie apps and eating 3 portioned meals a day helped me immensely. It’s hard at first not knowing, but it’s worth it to enjoy food and life again.
